string.text: The options here allow ZCP to work nicely together with other addons.\n This is similar to compatibility patches but just a lot more convenient.
For https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-anomaly/addons/glowsticks.\n Enables glowsticks to spawn as useful items.
For https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-anomaly/addons/anomaly-magazines-redux.\n Enables spawns of magazines for currently equipped weapons as extra-items in stash boxes.
For https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-anomaly/addons/anomaly-lootboxes.\n Enables lockpicks to spawn as useful items, as well as lootboxes in their own category.
